Message.Title: Blackstone bid
Message.Msg: Looks like a third firm is expressing interest at a higher price.
That's really old news. From March.

Message.Title: Dell needs to do to smart phones what it did with computers...
Message.Msg: "off the shelf parts" made to order unlocked imagine being able to order the number of MPs in your camera, front and back. camera type one or two SIMS SD card or not screen size and resolution case color CPU (INTC, Samsung, etc.) OS etc... Michael Dell might be the only one crazy enough, and with enough experience, to pull it off. That's how you save a computer company....
The whole game is rig. Putting out old news and not qualifying it.
Guess I got tricked, the story was dated 6/17/13.
do they read from the book to give answer ? just like HP LOL!!!!

Message.Title: Icahn tender offer 14? Nonsense
Message.Msg: So normal shareholders are going to decline an offer of 13.65 in the hopes that slimy Icahn comes up with $14, given his lack of funding. Office from Michael declined sends stock to 12. Then Icahn comes back and offers 12. He is just not serious, everyone knows he is just playing games. I really wish Michael dumped his 14% and walked away from this mess in pure spite, just to destroy Icahn and Southeastern.

Message.Title: Jeffries is 1/4 of required financing
Message.Msg: Scandalous BS offer. Its absurd that Icahn cannot make a legitimate offer. Its just him toying with the stock price at this point. Its still super glued to $13.45 till the buyout.

Message.Title: Who is Dell or whats a Dell...?..move to MNKD...we r moving up...bout to double soon.
Message.Msg: Sell tomorrow....and double your money with MNKD or HPJ...both bout to double....soon.Dell is a turtle...not moving...

Message.Title: Dell and the board have been have been lowballing from the start.
Message.Msg: vote no and wait for southeasterns proxie
